summary: A neural network module that applies a configurable 1×1 convolution to transform input feature maps into per‑class probability maps, without a preceding activation layer. It supports arbitrary spatial dimensions, stride, kernel size, and customizable ordering of normalization, dropout, and activation components.
business_intent: Provides a ready‑to‑use classification head for segmentation or dense prediction models, enabling downstream tasks such as medical image segmentation, scene parsing, or any application requiring per‑pixel class probabilities.
